title: Tulsi Gabbard Reused the Same Weak Password on Multiple Accounts for Years
summary:
Tulsi Gabbard Reused the Same Weak Password on Multiple Accounts for Years

Tulsi Gabbard, the director of national intelligence, used the same easily cracked password for different online accounts over a period of years, according to leaked records reviewed by WIRED. This revelation raises further questions about the security practices of the US spy chief, particularly after she unwittingly shared sensitive details of a military operation with a journalist in a Signal group chat.
